level_up_alert.description: This preference determines whether you will recieve a notification upon levelling up in coolness.

economy_invisibility.description: This will control whether you will show up on things like leaderboards and net server statistics concerning your economic data.

geoforecast_alert.description: This setting controls wether the bot will attempt to alert you at 12:00 UTC when there is an upcoming Kp index above or equal to 5.

ghost_command_output.description: Controls wether all command outputs will be ephemeral; only visible to you. Exceptions to this are commands that directly involve another user, which will always be visible.

autoresponses_require_ping.description: Controls whether autoresponses occur without the bot being directly @'ed also.

censoring.description: Enables a light swear word filter. Requires the manage webhooks permission.
